name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Miss America Deluxe
description: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model Miss America DeLuxe, manufactured in 1977.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Show
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Show. Manufactured by Bally in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Bikini
description: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model model Bikini, manufactured in 1961.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Beauty
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beauty. Manufactured by Bally in 1952.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Time
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Time. Manufactured by Bally in 1954.

name: Designer City 2
description:
Design and build a town, nurture and grow it into a gigantic sprawling metropolis. This free town building game can be played online and offline.
In this free town building game, you will need to attract residents by building houses, condos, apartments and skyscrapers for them to live in. Once they've settled in, they will need employment opportunities so you will also construct businesses and industry where they can work. Add bars, restaurants, nightlife, stadiums and other entertainment to keep your people happy. Construct hundreds of unique skyscrapers and world famous landmarks to decorate your city skyline.

name: Luminaria: Forgotten Echoes
description:
Witness humanities final struggle in this beautiful atmospheric puzzle adventure.
In Luminaria: Forgotten Echoes, move shadows around to guide your drone to new discoveries.

name: Space Exposures
description: Space Exposures is a kind of mini arcade game that gives you the chance to experience both the joy and the frustration that we astrophotographers can sometimes feel during a clear, starry night. Feel the thrill of delight from a perfectly captured photo, and despair in the utter frustration at all the clouds that constantly get in the way.

name: American Truck Simulator: Wild West Paint Jobs Pack
description: Embark on a journey through some legendary stories and Western movies with one of these fantastic paint jobs for your truck and trailer! Would you become a desperado or a bounty hunter? Or maybe it's the right time to let everyone know there is a new sheriff in town?

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Christmas Skin Pack
description: Oh deer, Christmas is here! Christmas inspired buses are coming to Angel Shores and Seaside Valley to celebrate the most festive of seasons. Customize your bus and make it your own with this Christmas themed skin pack.

name: American Truck Simulator: Steampunk Paint Jobs Pack
description: This pack is the perfect way to add some personality and style to your rig, with a single unique paint job for every truck, three common paints for all trucks, and two corresponding variants for ownable trailers.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Original Pack
description: This four table pack features some of the most iconic Super Heroes in the Marvel Universe: Spider-Man, Wolverine, Blade and Iron Man. Use your pinball wizardry to save the universe from notorious Super Villains! Marvel Pinball is the ultimate Super Hero pinball experience!

name: Automobilista 2: Supercars Pack Pt1
description: Supercars Pt1 brings road legal performance for Automobilista 2, with the Corvette C8 Z06, the Mclaren Senna and the Brabham BT62.

name: Marble World: Winter Pack
description: Expand your marble worlds with the winter pack! Introducing new props, effects, skins, paints and featuring a winter wonderland world to build your coolest track in.

name: Only go up
description: Get up there to avoid the rising water! It's scary, but you have to step up. It's up to you to adapt to reality or struggle.

name: Project VTS
description: Project VTS is a real-time TD game. You'll need to build your defence around your base and defend against different enemies from all directions in various terrains of the alien planet.Use your turrets, obstacles, power supply, resource facillities to defend your base.

name: Color Odyssey
description: Color Odyssey is a 3D platformer game, where you have to swap between 4 worlds to proceed, using your ingenuity and skill. You play as Gloria, a girl that lived in a blank, lifeless world, in her adventure to discover 4 colorful new ones!

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Marvel Legends Pack
description: Team up with iconic Super Heroes as they battle toe-to-toe with notorious villains in the Marvel Pinball: Marvel Legends Pack featuring "Captain America", "Doctor Strange" and "Fantastic Four".

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball - Cinematic Pack
description: Tables inspired by blockbuster films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe come together in this thrilling pack featuring "Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy", "Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Marvel's Ant-Man.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Empires - Castle Pack
description: The residences will become available for selection in Empire Mode.

name: Enemy Front: Multiplayer Map Pack
description: Multiplayer DLC includes 4 MP Maps and one special MP mode The Great Escape.

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 2
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Deltazone: Map Pack #1
description: This DLC gives you Access to 4 Maps.

name: NASCAR 21: Ignition - 2022 Throwback Pack
description: This collection of additional content for NASCAR 21: Ignition unlocks legendary NASCAR Champion Bill Elliott, his classic Melling and Mell-Gear paint schemes, the Frankie Zombie-designed paint scheme, plus over 80 additional paint schemes for the 2022 NASCAR Cup Series drivers

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 3
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Universal Monsters Pack
description: Two scarily authentic tables based on the Universal Monsters—MONSTER BASH and CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON! Play in their perfectly simulated original form or as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: Torch Cave 2: The Trail of Ashes
description: Can you help Quentin find his way out of the scorching trails of the powerful and angry volcano Ranohakao?

name: Pumping Simulator 2
description: A gas station management game, start by selling a car to raise funds and invest in an abandoned plot of land. Build, expand, and upgrade your gas station, diversify services, customize and manage time efficiently during peak hours. And maybe you will become rich

name: Endless Dungeon: Last Wish Edition
description: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe.

name: Entangled
description: Entangled is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control two quantum-entangled cat's at once. Solve each puzzle by making use of the two cats to escape a space research facility. Guide them through their journey.

name: Inaro
description: Inaro is a puzzle game by Blue Planet Software. The game would later become the basis for Yoshi's Cookie.

name: Platinum Sudoku
description: A J2ME port for Platinum Sudoku.

name: Nightmare Vortex
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Sudoku
description: An anime styled sudoku puzzle game.

name: Girlfriends: Rich vs Rebel
description: Experience the life of an average high school student, driven by a rebellious spirit that sets you apart. Uncover deep feelings concealed beneath the composed facade of your childhood friend and class president, Saki Urakaze. Yet, your attention is irresistibly drawn to Emi Otoishi, the enigmatic "bad girl" who unexpectedly becomes your roommate. As you navigate lighthearted moments and intense emotional trials, shape your relationships with Saki and Emi, discovering the essence of love, forgiveness, and personal growth. Who will win your heart in this epic high school love saga: Emi or Saki? The choice is yours!

name: DCHoc Cafe Sudoku
description: Play the next generation of Sudoku with infinite puzzles for endless fun! Grab a quick game on the go, form Cafes with your friends and create your own character for everyone to see. The better you play, the more you can win prizes, character personalization options and cool upgrades for your Cafe!

name: 30minutes Night Flight
description: Sin descripción

name: Cube Garden
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghostus
description: Sin descripción

name: Hamcorollin’
description: Sin descripción

name: KataPazz
description: Sin descripción

name: NyanNyanConnect
description: Sin descripción

name: Rinne
description: Sin descripción

name: Scarlet Gazers
description: Sin descripción

name: Short Piece
description: Sin descripción

name: Sludge Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweep It!
description: Sin descripción

name: Trick Art Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: OP.1953
description: Sin descripción

name: Too Bouncy?
description: It's a 2D pixel art game where you have to move a ball toward an exit point while collecting as many gems as possible. To move the box you need to push it with a box using your mouse or by touching your screen if you play on mobile. At the end of a level you will get a ranking from 1 to 3 stars. You'll be scored on time too. To unlock the next level you have to get at least a one star rating.

name: Doctor Who: Time Vortex 360
description: Take control of the TARDIS as you steer through the Time Vortex and different dimensions whilst avoiding collision with hazardous objects of both the past and the future in this exciting 360° game - Time Vortex 360.

name: Polaris Chord
description: Sin descripción

name: Factorio: Space Age
description: Factorio: Space Age continues the player's journey after launching rockets into space. Discover new worlds with unique challenges, exploit their novel resources for advanced technological gains, and manage your fleet of interplanetary space platforms.

name: Hana: Episode I
description: The first part of HANA, an adventure game for Playdate

name: Hana: Episode II
description: The conclusion to HANA Episode I for Playdate

name: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
description: Swing, jump, and blast through dimensions in this standalone follow-up to the critically-acclaimed 2D action-platformer Grapple Dog. Zip between action-packed worlds as Pablo and Luna team up to save the cosmos in their own unique ways.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Premium Edition
description:
Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure you are the last one standing.

With its vibrant graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Mixx Island Remix is a game that's easy to pick up but hard to put down.

name: Hang-On
description: Master System port of Hang-On.

name: World Cup Italia '90
description: Master System port of World Cup Italia '90. This soccer game lets you choose a team representing one of twenty-four countries around the world to participate in the World Championship tournament.

name: World Cup Italia '90
description: World Cup Italia '90 is a port of World Championship Soccer which was released in Europe. This port, however, had a license from FIFA to use the 1990 FIFA World Cup as brand.

name: Metal.ik Vol. I
description:
Dystopian world, the end after the end of time.

Quake-Inspired Shooter
Miami Hotline in Stampunk Style

name: Sega Soccer
description: Sega Soccer is a port of World Cup Italia '90, released inside compilations in Europe. This version of the game removed the license from FIFA and mentions any mentions of Virgin Mastertronic (the previous publisher).

name: Rapidfire
description: 6 Vanilla Compatible Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, for 6 days.

name: Rapidfire 2
description: Another set of 6 Vanilla Compatible Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, for 6 days.

name: Rapidfire 3
description: A Set of 6 Limit Removing Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, during my time being quarantined at home.

name: Metropolitan Mayhem Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: The Journey
description: A new 32-map megawad for DOOM II, focusing on short to medium length levels, played in a series or from pistol start, in single player or cooperative. THE JOURNEY takes you across a variety of locales, challenging you along the way with insidious traps and vicious monsters. The levels are easy to understand, but don't underestimate them because of the lack of massive hordes! Close quarters and strategical monster and item placement will test your skills. The average time to complete a given level is about 8 minutes.

name: Dominion of Madess
description: A 100 minute speedmap that took waaay longer than 100 minutes.

name: Serpent's Wake
description: Choose your path in the Serpent's Wake, an all-new Heretic adventure with three variations of each map. Featuring the quest system: each skill level represents a different way of playing each map. Monsters, items, progression, geometry and more change from quest to quest.

name: 5till L1 Complex
description: 5till L1 Complex is single-level PWAD designed by Lainos for Doom II. It was released in 2012 and requires a limit removing source port. The mod uses a music track and intermission music from the anime series Angel Beats! while replacing the title music with silence.

name: Sacrament
description: Sacrament is a Doom II episode replacement for limit-removing source ports with .ogg music support by Clan B0S. It features new graphics such as textures and weapon sprites, some new sounds and most notably the aforementioned custom mostly .ogg soundtrack. The plot follows a "Clan [B0S] fighter" as he wakes up from a nightmare into an apocalypse already in-progress. It is then gradually revealed that "the worthy" have already ascended to heaven, while everyone else have turned into bloodthirsty demons who are left to infight. He journeys into a now-desolate world, searching for answers as to what had happen, and why only he retained his humanity.

name: Lord of the Cyberdemons
description: This starts where Future Unveiled left off, at the entryway to where four angry Cyberdemons are about to blow you away, and you must rely on more than rockets or any weapons to get out alive!

name: The Uprising
description:
Looks like you're coming out of retirement, son.

Another citadel was taken over by the forces of Hell, just when you thought you exterminated them all!

This time, it's not so easy. The minions are more dedicated than ever, to take over the world! They've teamed up in larger numbers, and in tougher groups. This will be the toughest battle you may ever have been in, provided you can last through this marathon of gunfire.

name: Metal.ik Vol. II
description:
Ik a soul liberated full of hatred penetrates the depths of Internet to Play a cassette, because music is the only human vestige that remains.

FPS Steampunk like a Quake + Hotline Miami

name: Amnesia Re-collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal.ik Vol. III
description: Old school graphycs,Volume 3 is inspired by Tribes 2,Dom 3 and Hotline Miami

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition
description:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition is exclusive to the Bandai Namco Store and comes with:

Full game
Garage - A garage where you can park your Armored Core, inspired by the one available in the game. Size: 32 cm
Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon with never-before-seen visuals.
Digital Soundtrack - The complete Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon original soundtrack

name: Stop Sign Sprint
description: A simple, web browser game.

name: Sproing!
description: A physics-based skill game with 30 levels of orb destroying fun! Bonuses, bosses and survival mode included.

name: R-Type
description: Master System/Mark III port of R-Type.

name: Monstro Giganto
description: Welcome to the world of Monstro Giganto! Take control of one of the four monstros and duke it out against the other player or vs AI in four different arenas. Crafted with all PETSCII graphics with smart and progressively tougher AI, explosive music and sfx besides a generous amount of speech, Monstro Giganto is wrapped up in a challenging gameplay no Commodore monstro can resist!

name: R-Type
description: Game Boy port of R-Type.

name: Blood Orange
description:
Searching the Amazon for the elusive razorback dolphin, Nora discovers more than she bargained for.

Created in one month for Thalassophobia game jam.

name: Save The Deal
description: A nostalgic retro game with a sticker-collecting mission! Watch the moving stickers closely and send the right coordinates on the chat to get them and fill the sticker card. The more you get, the more you advance!

name: ColourPod
description:
You are the last colourPod. Your world has been driven to Darkness.

Collect colour fragments on your colour Lens to accumulate abilities used to destroy colourless fragments. Try to restore pixels to your world!

name: Space Harrier
description: Master System port of Space Harrier.

name: ColourPod 2: DimensionPod
description:
You are the last dimensionPod. Your dimensions have been driven to Darkness.
Collect colour fragments on your colour Lens to accumulate abilities used to destroy colourless fragments.
Warp to defeat fragments in both dimensions.
Complete missions to unlock hints that will help you master dimensionPod.
Try to restore pixels to your world!

name: Squirrel Stapler
description:
Originally created as part of The Dread X Collection II, Squirrel Stapler is a horror hunting simulator that satirizes low budget edutainment games with pitch black humor and panic-inducing absurdist horror.

A lonely man living in a remote cabin wakes up one day and realizes his beloved--a dismembered corpse nailed to the cabin wall--has been made ugly and rotten by the flies that swarm her. He wishes she were beautiful, like the squirrels of the wood. And so he sets out to hunt the squirrels of the wood, so that he might staple them to her and make her beautiful again.

But that is easier said than done. A sinister presence lurks in the deep forest, and it has only one rule: "Thou shalt not staple squirrels!"

name: Scary Library
description: C.H.A.I.N. link #18 revolves around a librarian in her workplace during a torrential thunderstorm. The specimen can purportedly possess people.

name: Abraxas
description:
Link #19 in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is purported to mirror an unknown apocalypse-esque event and its cover art supposedly has an intoxicating effect on some who witness it.

Now there is nothing more to do. I must do what I promised my father.
There is no information on the last entry of C.H.A.I.N..

name: Big Bang
description: Big Bang is an undeniably psychedelic platformer created by the mysterious coding group known as Psycore. Chock full of snazzy graphics, deadly teddies, and fiendish level designs, this is definitely not one to miss.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Blood Frontier
description: So, you want to ride with Padre and the Autarkis Gangrel of the Lost Souls coterie? You think you have what it takes to sleep rough over 1,200 miles of southern-Texas border with the Mexican Jaguar himself? To pistol-whip Sabbat incursions? To wrangle the cattle ranches and border crossings of the Circulatory System? To lasso drug mules carting vitae-laced meth? Big cojones, huh? Alright, saddle up. The border tribes can always use another quickdraw, if you pan out that is. Welcome to the Blood Frontier.

name: Killing Machine: Movement
description:
You are Kador, a heavily armed nano-augmented spell casting former agent of the Corset Timarchy. You navigate a psypunk future society of shifting alliances. Starting in the continent of Mass City.

An overly ambitious action platformer more than a decade in the making!

name: Oops, All Archers!
description: Oops, All Archers! is a romhack of Fire Emblem 8 that makes every unit an archer and bowlocks everyone while keeping the enemies unchanged.

name: The Beginning of the End: Part 2
description: The follow up to The Beginning of the end. Lots of new stuff here. All these levels have an original feel to them. You will enjoy playing these wads! But be warned... they are tough!

name: Galactic Defenders
description: Galactic Defenders is an exciting arcade game that puts players in control of a powerful spaceship on a mission to protect the galaxy from invading enemy spaceships. As a skilled pilot and defender of the cosmos, your objective is to obliterate the incoming waves of hostile ships while dodging their relentless attacks. The game features an intuitive control system that allows players to navigate their spaceship with precision, aiming and firing at the encroaching foes. With each successful takedown, players earn points that contribute to their score. As the game progresses, the intensity ramps up, presenting players with faster and more cunning adversaries. Prepare to engage in an adrenaline-pumping battle as you strive to achieve the highest score and secure your place as the ultimate Galactic Defender.

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Android 21 - Lab Coat
description:
Android 21, an original character from DRAGON BALL FighterZ, now joins the fight in her appearance before transformation!

This content includes:
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for her outfit
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Lobby Avatar
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Z Stamp

name: Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Zukan: Soushuu-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudoku
description: A homebrew version of sudoku for the NES.

name: 3 In 1: Sudoku, Mahjong, MineSweeper
description: Treat yourself to three classic games: Sudoku, Mahjong, and Minesweeper. Each game features different levels of difficulty, many levels, and a beautiful game environment. All three games require logic and strategy. Sudoku is the game where you must get numbers in sequential order without repeating a number. Mahjong is the classic game of grouping similar tiles. Minesweeper is the original computer game where you must carefully pinpoint the location of mines through logic and the process of elimination.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 4: Last Resort
description:
A season of Fortnite: Chapter 4

The fate of the Island's at stake in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 4, and thievery's the last resort. Are you in?

name: Suzu ga Utau Hi
description: A small town along the sea. A slight tide smell in the air ... in such a town I met a girl. Girl's name is Suzu. That small incident changed the boring summer and turned it into an irreplaceable season that I won't be able to forget till the rest of my life...

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Question Arcs
description: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Question Arcs is a bundle released exclusively on MangaGamer's website that includes the first four remastered chapters of the game.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Answer Arcs
description: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Answer Arcs is a bundle released exclusively on MangaGamer's website that includes the last four remastered chapters of the game.

name: Dr. Driving
description:
Dr. Driving drives you crazy!

Burn up the street with the fastest and most visually stunning driving game.

name: Blood Flows Where My Shotgun Blows
description: 6 relatively short maps for Final Doom: The Plutonia Experiment

name: Donkey Quiz
description: Come and test your trivia skills with the latest addictive QUIZ game - Donkey Quiz by Octro. Take the ride of knowledge on Donkey Quiz Game with fun and interesting trivia questions. Exercise your mind with educational multiplayer brain game. Challenge your friends to achieve the highest score in the trivia fun quiz.

name: End Game
description: End Game is an eight map collaboration PWAD for Doom II. The project is the last active contribution to the Doom community by Anthony Soto (Swedish Fish). There is no set theme as the map environments range from gothic castles to tech bases.

name: Rising Blood
description: This is a remake of one of Chris Hansen's really early levels. He always considered it as his first really good level and felt that it needed a revival.

name: Shoot!
description: The aim was to create a level with a classic approach to custom pwad making. In other words, he just wanted to make an old school Doom 2 map with lots of fun action, a hard pumped midi track, no custom textures besides the sky and a short no-bullshit title!

name: Flay the Obscene: Compilation
description: A combination of the first 4 Flay the Obscene releases (1-3 and DM) in 1 package.

name: Funny Soccer
description:
Funny Soccer - 2 Player Games free - Battle with your friends, funny, amazing game play and physics !

If you a fan of soccer, football. Funny Soccer is a best fun game free for you. A fun and bouncy Soccer games free. Battle with your friend in amazing soccer. With physics world, it make the character jump and kick like an idiot. This game make you laugh till die =)))

name: Flay the Obscene: Reversed
description: This map is a revamp of the original Flay the Obscene, which was released in 1999. As the title states, the 1st map has been reversed with you starting at the end.

name: Gamma Labs
description: An action packed episode 1 style map from the creator of CH Retro Episode.

name: High/Low 5
description: This map is the conclusion of my High/Low series. This map is full of trick, traps, ambushes and puzzles. There is also a good deal of variety in the layout, so expect to do a little base jumping and try to watch your step at all times.

name: The Mean Green
description: The levels are small-medium in size and plays more like Ult. Doom since only lower tier monsters and weaponry were used. They should offer a good 45 minutes of some classic, old school fun! The action is fast paced and the levels feature their usual style of interconnectivity and semi-realistic to abstract visuals.

name: The Mean Green 2
description:
The first 3 maps saw you fighting against Imps, Sergeants and Demons with only the Shotgun, Chaingun and the Rocket Launcher. This time they are cranked up to 11 and you're gonna get bigger guns. But also a whole lot of beefier meat to aim them at! You are the Mean Green and you are about to bully the crap out of this strange world!
The levels are medium sized and sets the player in an abstract semi realistic hellish tech setting.

name: High/Low 2
description: High/Low 2 is a Doom Episode 2 themed level. Like High/Low 1, which was an episode 1 kinda level it is only meant to resemble the style, not to copy it.

name: The Wailing Horde
description: This one large map is Chris Hansen's interpretation of an action filled and slightly different episode 2 level. It tried to stay true to the style of eps. 2, but cranked it up a bit.

name: Gore
description: Some classic, oldschool cramped Ult. Doom gameplay with 2 maps. Originally was supposed to have been released for Doom's 25th birthday as a set consisting of 4 maps.

name: Little Rocketman
description: The aim of the game is to guide Little Rocketman to the end of each world. Control his rockets to jump from platform to platform, get to the last platform of each world to continue to the next. Play Little Rocketman game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Megaman RPG
description: First, you get to battle the original six robots from mega man in any order. You then win their moves to use in battle. After the six robots; Bomb Man, Guts Man, Cut Man, Elec Man, Ice Man, and Fire Man have been destroyed, take on the Evil Dr. Wily at his Castle where many perilous fights await . . .

name: Millennium Mini-Episode
description: A collection of DOOM Millennium maps originally from 1998-1999 in a four-map mini-episode.

name: Alpha Wings 2
description: As one of the three brave pilots of Alpha Wing it's up to you to defeat the alien menace. Each Alpha Wing spacecraft has its own deadly weapons system to exterminate the vicious alien forces. These three courageous fighters are the last hope to bring freedom to the galaxy. Failure is not an option!

name: The Darkened Outpost
description: Yet another demon-infested, abandoned base. Fight your way through these nukage-processing industrial environments and expect surprises.

name: Plutonium Sandpit
description: A very large single map for Doom2. You are para- dropped on an abandoned industrial sand planet to investigate why the base was deserted. Sensors indicate the presence of hellspawn. Find the cause why facilities have ceased production and destroy any hellspawn you face.

name: Brotherhood of Ruin: The Lost Temple
description: A Large single map for DOOM2, taking place in an ancient temple complex swarming with hellspawn. Occasional switchhunt might occur as the map isn't very linear. Be warned and pay attention to the surroundings of the map.

name: Casio KungFu
description: Rare Casio KungFu CG-310 Vintage 1984 Electronic Game

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Knuckles Mod
description: A character mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate that adds in Knuckles, complete with a custom moveset ported from P+.

name: Sudoku but it's on the MD
description: It's sudoku, and it's running on the Mega Drive.

name: Night Freak
description: A retro style horror game with silent hill style camera, tank controls, vhs filters, and survival horror elements.

name: Sudoku Master
description: A sudoku collection featuring 600 unique puzzles.

name: Plug and Play Sudoku
description: A plug and play version of sudoku.

name: Clorox: Sparkling Sudoku
description: Clorox: Sparkling Sudoku is an Adobe Flash sudoku game by Clorox.

name: Sudoku 23
description: Sudoku 23 is a version of Sudoku that is playable on the NES.

name: Moonlit
description: Moolit was made in 3 weeks by ZahranW and KingW for MVM14.

name: Selene: Apoptosis - 18+ Adult Only Patch
description: This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent).

name: SeasonPark
description: In this Game you follow the story of a man that is searching his wife and his kids. They all disappeared in an abondend indoor playground. This indoor playground is themed after the four seasons with its mascots named Sally Spring, Siggi Summer, Frederick Fall and Willy Winter. You need to break in this playground and explore it to find your children and wife ( with no keycards!!!). You get the help from your friendly winter stick. With that stick, you can create ice blocks on which you can jump on.

name: Pikmin 1 Randomizer
description: A hack for Pikmin 1 that swaps the locations of ship parts, enemies, and more. Face hordes of creatures in areas they wouldn't be in otherwise! Are you up to the challenge?

name: The Bunnyman
description: Your roommate, Tyler, decided to go camping with some friends a couple of weeks ago near Fairfax Station. He hasn't been seen in almost a month. Although you have tried to reach out and contact him, he has not responded. Fearing the worst, you decide to go and investigate to see if you can find him. Along the way, you realize that something sinister is happening behind the scenes.

name: Franzen
description: Franzen is a turn-based RPG set in a dystopian-steampunk world. Explore themes of empathy and politics as Franz and Lefsa Dellia work to uncover the truth of "The Scream". Meet a cast of colorful characters and fight bizarre creatures in your journey through the world of Branzen!

name: Chrono Trigger
description:
An enhanced port of Chrono Trigger that adds anime cutscenes and an exclusive Extras Mode. It is also known for having significantly longer load times in comparison to the original SNES version.

Extras Mode is an option in the main menu that let players view cutscenes and artwork, listen to music, and view information about techs, enemies, bosses, endings, and item locations.

It was first released for PlayStation in Japan before it came to North America as part of the Final Fantasy Chronicles compilation.

name: Chrono Trigger
description:
A port of Chrono Trigger for Japanese i-mode phones, based on the DS version. This version was separated in two episodes.

Each part cost 600 points (equivalent to 630 yen) and required at least a FOMA 903i series phone to play.

name: Chrono Ressurection
description:
Chrono Resurrection is an unreleased fangame developed by Resurrection Games under Nathan Lazur's direction, based on the Super NES role-playing game Chrono Trigger. The project was initially called CT64 and was meant to be a complete remake of the original game for the Nintendo 64 with both 2D and 3D playing modes, but it was eventually reworked from scratch.

On September 6, 2004, the project was publicly closed after Resurrection Games received a cease-and-desist letter from Square Enix for trademark and copyright infringement.

name: PhobosDeimos Anomaly
description: PhobosDeimos Anomaly is a 2012 mod for Doom containing two six-level episodes, totaling twelve levels, created with maps submitted to Doom the Way id Did by the late Callum Guy Oliver (phobosdeimos1) and released posthumously.

name: Shy Dwarf
description: An abstract puzzle platformer made by Jaromír Plachý, author of Botanicula and Chuchel. Navigate the Shy Dwarf through series of landscapes to the always unclear destination and try not to get too confused.

name: Warped North
description: It was a small wonder when, after a mechanical malfunction, the transport ship moving you to an isolated research facility crashed, granting you your long-overdue freedom. But the new frigid land you've arrived in swarms with jabbering, malicious little creatures, and you can't help but sense you may have caught the attention of something sinister.

name: Passpartout: The One Man Band
description: Compose your own music and perform it in front of strangers on the street! Adhere to the feedback from your listeners and bewitch them with your catchy beats and melodies!

name: Bee Garden: The Lost Queen
description: Bee Garden: The Lost Queen is a time management game with cute characters and innovative dynamic visuals. Complete 40 story levels in 4 breath-taking environments with day and night missions and special rush levels! Try your skills in 4 special challenges and beat the high scores! Be the best and collect all of the 8 trophies.

name: Riskant!
description:
Based on the hit television show, "Riskant!" (which itself is based on "Jeopardy!") for Commodore 64 and Amiga features support for three players. Before starting, you can enter the number of participants, their names, gender and appearance.

Gameplay consists of selecting a category and money value with number keys. After the "answer" appears, you have 7 seconds to buzz in. Answering involves selecting the start of the question ("Who is/was ...", "What is/was ..." etc.) and completing the question with the right answer in 30 seconds.

After the first two rounds, players with positive dollar amounts can play in Riskant! Finale. The player with the most money at the end of this round wins the game.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Stamina Bar
description: A challenging mod that implements a stamina bar for all items.

name: 3D Dinosaur Hunter
description: This 2000 edition of Eyewitness Virtual Reality Dinosaur Hunter updates some of the information and makes some minor changes, like replacing Segnosaurus with Therizinosaurus. It also adds a second disc called 3D Dinoworld, in which you can freely explore six prehistoric environments and observe dinosaurs in their daily life.

name: Turok 3: Shadow of Oblivion
description:
Turok 3: Shadow of Oblivion is a faithful restoration of the classic first-person shooter originally released in 2000 for the Nintendo 64, upgraded through Nightdive Studios’ proprietary KEX Engine for play on modern gaming devices with up to a 4K resolution at 120FPS.

It joins Nightdive Studios, Universal Games, and Digital Platforms’ popular Turok and Turok 2: Seeds of Evil remasters, capping off the trilogy. Turok 3 Shadow of Oblivion Remastered features upgraded gameplay, high-resolution textures, enhanced lighting and rendering, and support for console gamepads with platform-specific features.

Finish the hunt in this epic finale to the Turok Trilogy. Pick up immediately after the events of Turok 2: Seeds of Evil, with dual protagonists Joseph and Danielle Fireseed, of the Turok family tree, as they battle the titular antagonist Oblivion and its followers, the Flesh Eaters.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: 2.0 Update
description:
Update 2.0 introduces a free overhaul of the game’s core mechanics. Said overhauls include a new cyberware system, which correlates V’s armor stats to your equipped cyberware rather than your clothing. This offers a greater degree of expression alongside stat-based boosts and debuffs depending on your layout; a new perks system that introduces the ability to deflect bullets, dash in mid-air, and a variety of finishing moves; and an all-new skill tree associated with the Relic chip embedded in V’s body, which only further supercharges your various abilities.

Update 2.0 also brings an introduction of a brand-new vehicular combat system, allowing V to ride shotgun and hack nearby vehicles while in-transit to inflict carnage on any would-be assailants. The introduction of vehicular combat comes with an overhaul to the game’s “wanted” system, allowing various tiers of the NCPD to give chase until they finally throw the big guns at you: The heavily-armored and highly lethal MaxTac Psycho Squad.

Cyberpunk 2077's 2.0 Update also comes with over 100 new items, ranging from new weapons, to new pieces of clothing, to new Cyberware, to new vehicles.

name: Samurai Warrior
description: Choose your samurai ninja martial arts fighter and battle it out in a dojo or outside.

name: Kaun Banega Crorepati
description: Do you love game show trivia? Have you always dreamed of taking home the win from a game show? Now you can, with the Official Kaun Banega Crorepati Trivia Game. Based on the hit game show, now you can show off your game show trivia knowledge and win big!

name: Whip the Worker
description: Beat your co-worker all you want. But he won't go down either!

name: Npower Test Series
description: As any decent batsman will tell you- you need concentration, timing and excellent shot selection to play a big innings. And you've got 12 overs and 10 wickets to build an unassailable total. At the end of the game, enter your score to see if you rate as one of the all time greats!

name: Monster Poolside Sumo
description: There's a sumo ring in the pool. But instead of wrestlers, you get to play some monster on an inflatable pool toy. Play Monster Poolside Sumo game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Alien Clones
description: Be fast and accurate - defend yourself from the onslaught of alien clones.

name: Boom Boom Volleyball
description: In this beach-volley game you'll be playing with a bomb instead of a ball don't drop it on your side!

name: Sheepish
description: Navigate your sheep through traffic and across the river without getting hit.

name: Sub Commander
description: Control this submarine and plunge into the depths of the ocean. Dodge huge rocks, mines and icebergs and get as far as you can.

name: Reel Gold
description:
Reel Gold is an addictive mining game that you can play online and for free on Silvergames.com. Aim of the game is to clear each level of gold before the time runs out. Move your mine wagon around on the rails with left and right arrows. Fire the rope down to reel in gold with arrow up/down.

Time is working against you in this fun gold digging adventure so try to beat it every round. There is not only gold in the underground but also stones, which you have to avoid as they are only wasting your time. Try to dig for the golden stones only and collect them as fast as you can. Are you ready? Good luck with Reel Gold!

name: Magic Balls
description: The main goal of the game is to leave only a single ball on the board.

name: UFO Joe
description: UFO Joe and his fellow aliens are bored. To rectify the situation, UFO Joe has been given the task of collecting mysterious creatures for the local Zoo. That'll put the fun back in alien life!

name: Crypt Raider
description: Move the mystical blue balls into the portal to escape the level!

name: Detonator
description: A puzzle game that involves a weird M&M looking guy and a platform full of bombs. Detonates in your mouth, not in your hands.

name: Lords of the Chaos
description:
Lords of the Chaos is a single player real time strategy game which has everything needed for an unforgettable experience.

The game has a default campaign with the story shown before each map starts and had a download option, with multiple server providers, to get additional campaigns or maps. Some downloads were free including a second campaign available at launch while others had to be bought separately.

There are 4 unit types in the game with commands for movement or a general attack into the fog of war and a behavior option that is active when waiting for orders, the hero unit can also cast spells.

There are 6 map tile types with grass as the only place to build, swamp and sand allow movement, water and mountains acting as barriers along with trees that can be chopped down for resources and to make paths.

There are 6 buildings available with different uses and menu options: main camp to train workers and the hero, farms for food to manage army size, Training camps to train and upgrade warriors or catapults, Towers for vission or upgraded to hold a catapult, wizard tower to research or change a hero's spells and gold mines for workers to gather money.

Due to CPU speed and memory differences between phone models, some features were removed from the relevant versions. These changes can include the map download feature, animations and spells.

name: Mission Mars
description: Level the city to secure your landing!

name: Starfield: Shattered Space
description: This will be the first story expansion to Starfield. This DLC is bundled with Premium Edition (digital), Premium Edition Upgrade (digital), Premium Edition Upgrade (physical), and Constellation Edition of Starfield.

name: Bush Royal Rampage
description: Help President Bush protect the queen as chaos emerges in London!

name: Paladins: Feathered Fiend Pack
description: Hold on tight and get ready for a wild ride across the Realm aboard the Feathered Fiend Mount!

name: J-Jump Arena
description: A turn based, jumping elimination game where everything happens all at once! Learn to be precise with your jumps and weapon handling, as well as in the art of outsmarting your opponents! Multiplayer for up to 10 players and single player mode available.

name: Paladins: Season 4 Champions Bundle
description:
Instantly unlock all six Champions released in Season 4 for one low price!

This bundle contains Champion unlocks for Yagorath, Octavia, Vatu, Rei, Saati, and Azaan.

Plus, you'll get an Emote, MVP, and unlocked Talents for all six Champions!

name: DanMachi Battle Chronicle
description:
Experience the world of Danmachi in 3D with fully voiced dialogue! Relive the story of Danmachi in 3D together with your favorite characters brought to life via anime-style 3D graphics! You can also enjoy game-exclusive movies and scenes drawn at totally different angles from the anime!

Monsters await you in the Dungeon where you can make use of a variety of methods of attacking and evading in exhilarating battles with simple controls!
Perform your favorite deadly attacks, including Firebolt and Lil Rafaga, in spectacular fashion. Go adventuring with your favorite characters!

Take on other adventurers in Magic Stone Contests, free-for-all battles where everyone is an enemy! These are battle royales fought between 8 different players.
Gather more Magic Stones than anyone else to become number 1!

name: Hell's Eventide
description: Because of three different authors the theme and style differed greatly, but with a little refining the whole thing clicked. A hellish level with a few traps, tricks and unwanted welcomes...

name: Avatar's Demise
description: This level oozes atmosphere and plays quite well. It was originaly VERY easy so a lot of vials and other powerups and ammo were removed making it more enjoyable.

name: Bytesize
description: 12 small maps, each limited to 100 linedefs.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Outbreak
description: When the village of Hinamizawa is suddenly placed under lockdown by the government, the villagers begin rioting and killing each other as supplies grow scarce. The school club members try to escape the chaos and retreat to Okinomiya, but more problems arise.

name: Warframe: The Seven Crimes of Kullervo
description:
Return to Duviri and delve into a sprawling new island dungeon where the tragic Warframe, Kullervo, awaits your redemption. This strange, floating prison obfuscates both Kullervo’s crimes as well as the mysterious (yet familiar) Warden who binds him under lock and key. Explore the prison’s cells to uncover the story of Kullervo’s misdeeds and wield the power of treachery through his trademark daggers and thirst for vengeance.

As a mainline update It contains an exhaustive list of quality of live changes to the game. The main new content is the 53rd Warframe, Kullervo, and his signature weapons along with the chance to encounter his story missions on a new island in Duviri.
Other Duviri changes include Captain Vor's appearance in Undercroft challenge missions for a chance at new arcanes, Kaithe customization with armor and ephemera, 2 new side missions with Paragrimm's Tomes and Lost Belongings objectives, the return of Kaithe races and 15 new decrees.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Hinamizawa Teiryuujo
description:
Two students living in Hinamizawa, Rika Furude, and Mion Sonozaki, rest at a bus stop on a rainy day and wait for the bus to arrive. Some employees soon join them, who are working on a project that will build a dam in Hinamizawa but result in the village's destruction. As the group makes their acquaintance, they talk about a phenomenon related to the strange deaths of dam project employees, the curse of Oyashiro-sama.

Hinamizawa Teiryuujo was the prototype of what would later become Higurashi When They Cry, initially proposed as a stage play written by Ryukishi07, but it was rejected by the theater company and later repurposed for the game.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Kamikashimashi-hen
description: The club has successfully made it to Okinomiya and evades more crazed villagers as they try to find the Sonozaki family's stronghold, meeting a girl named Une who may hold the key to salvation. Meanwhile, Rika and Hanyuu stay behind in Hinamizawa and do some investigating of their own, encountering some old acquaintances.

name: Fly the Plane
description: Sin descripción

name: QUByte Classics: Gourmet Warriors
description: Save the city from demonic mutant robots attempting to take over!

name: Farming Tractor Simulator 2023: Drive Combine & Trucks
description: Start sowing the seeds of success today!

name: The Discrete Era
description: An Action-Roguelike, multiplayer coop game.

name: Speedin' Shotgun
description: A cube with a shotgun; what could go wrong? Speedin' Shotgun is a fast paced one-button precise-platformer. Shoot your way through levels, try to beat your best times, create levels, watch your replays, and more! Try not to rage.

name: Polaroid: Pieces of Memory
description: Roid, the handyman of a small town, retrieves a photo album filled with memories from an old box in the shed. As he flips through the Polaroid photos, he takes a journey back in time to revisit the memories leading up to his journey of becoming a handyman.

name: Panda Choice Mahjong
description: The panda has made her choice! Follow her into the wonderful world of the most ancient game.

name: Fractal Glide
description: Experience the mesmerizing world of fractals as you glide through meticulously repeating landscapes. Immerse yourself in a tranquil journey, finding awe in the beauty of math. Embark on an adventure where the goal is exploration and the discovery of infinite art through the wonders of fractals.

name: Hard Hero
description: Heroes are doing many things to save the world. Fight with enemy, dirve vehicles and combine to robot. Player control the vehicles and combine each other during avoid enemy's attack. Player can feel how hard to saving world. Challenge to being hero.

name: I Made this Game in 3 Days
description: Embark on a buggy adventure in "I made this Game in 3 Days"! I'm not kidding when I say this roguelike masterpiece was birthed in just 72 hours. Dive headfirst into a realm of whimsical chaos, where every bug is a feature and every glitch is a delightful surprise.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Variety Pack 7XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Brave 22
description: Sin descripción

name: Chimeras: Heavenfall Secrets Collector's Edition
description: Astrid and Greta are the best of friends, but when she goes missing during the semester break at their magical school, Astrid needs your help as a detective to find her. As you dig deeper, you'll discover she's not the only student to vanish in these hallowed halls.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Kaguya Otsutsuki
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Kaguya Otsutsuki as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Revelation
description: Revelation is a text based first person 2D adventure game. In a world where detectives do not exist, investigate cases with main character Ryude.

name: Armored Core VI Fires of Rubicon: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full game
• Exclusive Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
Allows players to view concept art and listen to in-game music.

A new action game based on the core concept of the Armored Core series that utilizes the knowledge and experience gained from FromSoftware's recent action game development.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Daredevil Edition
description:
The Daredevil Edition of Guilty Gear -Strive- includes the base game, Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2, Season Pass 3, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters announced with its release.

Season Pass 2 and 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a Color Pack which unlocks 6 color variations for the 4 characters in the related pass. Season Pass 3 also has an exclusive Color Pack with 3 additional color variations for its characters that missed both 25th Anniversary Color Packs.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1. A color variant in the Season Pass 2 and 3 Color Packs matches the Ultimate Edition color variation for their characters.

The Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary Special Additional Color Pack unlocks 2 color variations for the 24 characters available at the end of Season Pass 2.

name: Riders Republic: 360 Edition
description: With the Riders Republic 360 Edition, take your experience to the next level. Enjoy the skate and hoverboard for a unique freeriding experience across the Republic's vibrant open world. Build your legend with original sports (bike,* ski, snowboard, and wingsuit).

name: Riders Republic: Complete Edition
description: With the Riders Republic Complete Edition, face no restrictions and shred like there is no tomorrow! Enjoy the skateboard, BMX, and hoverboard for a unique urban riding experience through the Republic's vibrant open world. Build your legend with original sports (racing bike, mountain bike, ski, snowboard, and wingsuit).

name: Riders Republic: Skate Edition
description: Shred the Ridge like never before with Riders Republic Skate Edition. Hop on your board and ride across brand-new skate parks! The Skate Edition includes the base game and the Skate add-on.

name: Wildfire
description: Wildfire is a third person game where you engage in aerial firefighting

name: Medieval Delivery
description: Because deliveries also existed in medieval times, this is a third-person simulation and adventure game where you'll have the task of making deliveries throughout the village according to the requests of its inhabitants, such as meat, flour, bread, and perhaps other things.

name: Vivaion
description: Vivaion is a next-generation battle royale & open-world MMORPG. Players can explore, fight, craft, level up & collect rare items scattered across the universe.

name: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race
description: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race is an exciting and action-packed game where your Nanos race against other Nanos for the top spots in the weekly leaderboards. Win awesome prices and show your opponents that your Nanos are just faster.

name: CoopValor WW2 Battle of the Bulge
description: First and third person shooter set in World War II. Single player and multiplayer. He fights in the Ardennes against the SS.

name: Warframe: Echoes of Duviri
description:
This update adds Wisp Prime along with her signature weapons Fulmin Prime and Gunsen Prime. These additions replace Nidus Prime, Strun Prime and Magnus Prime which have now been added to the Prime Vault.

Other additions include a new drifter melee weapon Argo & Viel, new Undercroft tiles with a Jackal assassination mission, 5 new Incarnon weapons, 4 new Warframe augment mods, 4 new Duviri decrees, and a Duviri dojo room that allows you to free roam on the Harbinger’s Pass and Courtier’s Bliss islands.

name: Aquapark io: Animals DLC
description:
- City Cup map
- Summer cat skin
- Magican pig skin
- Rainbow zebra skin
- Cowboy horse skin
- Artist fox skin
- Pilot elephant skin
- Penguin skin
- Chef mouse skin
- Checkered bear skin

Slide, jump, fly and become the fastest animal!

name: Aquapark io: Sweet and Spooky DLC
description: Race with your friends in sweet and spooky skins on new Candy map!

name: Aquapark io: Movie Stars DLC
description: Race with your friends in movie stars skins on new Hollywood map!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Limitless Bunny Pack
description: Expand your AEW playable roster with The Bunny and Keith Lee and gain access to two brand new minigames: MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling.

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Draw Extended
description:
Comic Coloring Book - Complete Edition is fun for big and small, especially for young, creative fans of comic books! Enjoy adventures, use different drawing tools and create!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Features:
— Great fun for children - and an excellent way to introduce them to comics.
— 23 stories, each consists 4 graphics - making a total of 92 coloring pages!
— Best tool for children to express their creativity - while improving their motor skills and awareness of colors and shapes.
— Beautiful drawings - created by an artist with many years of experience in making illustrations for children.
— Stickers!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade + Character DLC Pack
description: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Full Game plus Arcade + Character DLC Pack Bundle
description: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Warframe: Abyss of Dagath
description:
Abyss of Dagath adds the quest for the 54th Warframe, Dagath, in a new Naberus-inspired story from the Entrati Grandmother. Dagath’s appearance and kit bear some resemblance to a certain equine companion you may have met in Duviri — and comes with a brand-new blade and whip melee weapon.

This update has some big changes that aim to improve the broader gameplay experience, including a major overhaul of companions and a rework for the aquatic swashbuckler, Hydroid!
Other planned changes include Auto-melee, a focus acquisition rework and the removal of flawed mods and MK-1 Weapons.

More information about Dagath and the full update will be revealed in the September Devstream ahead of Abyss of Dagath's release this October!

name: Doctor Who Monster Invasion: Escape the Silence
description: The Eleventh Doctor has to help several humans escaping from the Silence by beaming the humans and Oods up to the TARDIS. It uses codes from the Doctor Who Monster Invasion magazine to get extra power-up and points.

name: Trip World DX
description:
Travel across four fantastic lands and Mount Dubious in Trip World DX! Our hero Yakopoo's adventure begins when the Maita flower, a symbol of world peace and happiness, is stolen, throwing Trip World into chaos!

Fly through the air, traverse over the land, and swim through the water, collecting special items to help you find the flower and restore Trip World.

Use Yakopoo's shapeshifting powers to save Trip World from darkness! Race across the ground as a ball. Grow a tail to hit enemies—or a flower to make your enemies friendly!

This new version collects the classic handheld adventure Trip World in its original form, as well as the brand new color version bringing all new life to the world of Yakopoo! Discover how the game was made and all new secrets in the museum mode including development documents and video interviews, or go listen to one of the greatest game soundtracks ever made in the music player!

name: Whitestone
description: On the 'Sunchaser's capstone voyage to the Arctic, it's smooth sailing until Jack's quarters are broken into and his friend goes missing. Unsure who to trust, Jack is forced to fight nightmares both mental and physical as he becomes the prime suspect for a terrible deed.

name: Doctor Who: Eye of the TARDIS
description:
The Tenth Doctor has become trapped inside the TARDIS - right inside. His consciousness has been accidentally transferred into the TARDIS' memory core.

You will have to guide the Doctor through four sectors of the TARDIS' neutral network - gathering artron energy crystals along the way to reach the data/matter converter and escape.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Legendary Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Johnny Trigger: Johnnybee Edition
description:
Looking for action? Here’s Johnny in Johnnybee skin with Bulletstorm weapon!
Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends.

name: Super Night at the Gates of Hell
description: Sin descripción

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Leone Abbacchio
description:
Bucciarati's team is fully reunited in All-Star Battle R with the playable character addition of Leone Abbacchio and his detective stand, Moody Jazz. Make your opponents think twice and see double with Leone Abbacchio! Available Now!

Contents:
- Leone Abbacchio as a playable character
- Additional Leone Abbacchio JoJo Glossary, Model Viewer, Sound Test, and Art Viewer
- Additional Leone Abbacchio collection items at the in-game store

name: Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition
description:
Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game, Expansion Pack #1, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #2 for a total of 20 new levels, 12 new armors and new enemies from both expansions.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: Moto Rush GT: Back To School Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Full Garage and Grip Collection #2 with:

- 17 new vehicles—including an ATV and bicycle!
- 8 new gloves
- New colors for the rest of motorbikes
- New colors for gloves
- Special, Golden colors for motorbikes
- four pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control.

name: Masala Drive
description: Super high-occupancy over 1000%! How many passengers on the bus can you goal with? Many Masala sound BGM for driving.

name: Paper io 2
description:
Welcome to Paper.io 2, the ultimate conquest game from Voodoo! Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition with a smooth drawing experience!

Are you ready to become the champion of township and take over the game? With Paper.io 2, you can draw your way to victory and claim your space before your opponents beat you to it.

name: Paper io 2: Animals DLC
description:
Conquer new maps with your friends in animal skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 15 animal skins: cow, giraffe, hippo, duck, piggy, rhino, mouse, mammoth, rabbit, dog, snail, white whale, cobra, elephant, unicorn
- 6 hats: fur with ears, guitar, crocodile, police cap, crown, diadem
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: duck, fish, cat, rabbit, whale, bird, butterfly, octopus, seahorse
- 10000 coins

Put on skins of cute animals, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!

name: Paper io 2: Mishmash DLC
description:
Conquer new maps with your friends in mishmash skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 13 diverse skins: bus, burger, donut, poop, toilet, ufo, robot, ninja, santa, crab, car, police car, airplane
- 5 hats: widget, "truck" cap, helmet with horns, apple with an arrow, witch hat
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: car, boat, poop, sport bike, cruiser, scooter, headphones, teddy bear, crown
- 10000 coins

Put on funny mishmash skins, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!

name: NASCAR Arcade Rush: Project-X Edition
description: NASCAR Arcade Rush Project-X Edition is the ultimate NASCAR arcade experience for fans young and old by combining the full game with the thrill of all the Project-X digital content available.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Back To School Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Weaponry Upgrade and Elite Arsenal with:

- With the Expansion Pack you can fight and survive the zombie apocalypse in a brand new game mode!
- Play new maps or revisit old ones with new weapons.
-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy
-RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design
-BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west
-SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle

Conquer your enemies in the wild west style!

name: Sonic Superstars: Digital Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO
description: Sonic Superstars Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO

name: Fun Chess: Extended Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Definitive Edition
description:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

Meet the locals and get your tools. Sit down or stand and wait for pike, salmon, and other smaller or bigger fish to swallow the hook. Show everyone your trophies. Catch fish and artifacts with a fishing net or a suitable rod.

name: Hole io
description: Can you move the black hole to swallow the buildings into the hole like an attacking hole master? The clock is ticking, tik tok, tik tok, will you succeed to swallow?

name: Hole io: Animals DLC
description: Wear animal skins and visit new Farm map with your friends!

name: Hole io: Freaks DLC
description: Wear freaky skins and visit new SciFi map with your friends!

name: Hole io: Red Planet DLC
description: Wear crazy skins and visit new Mars map with your friends!

name: Hentai Girls Special Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Doctor Who: Flight Simulator
description: A flight simulator game inspired by the Doctor Who Series 2 episode "The Impossible Planet".

name: RPG Bundle
description: Teleport to fantasy world and defeat monsters to become the best fighter!

name: Warframe: Whispers in the Walls
description:
Coming to all platforms this winter, Whispers in the Walls will drop you into a hair-raising conflict rife with shocking revelations that will shake the Origin System to its very core.

In this new story-driven cinematic quest, you'll be caught in the middle of a deadly battle between Albrecht Entrati, one of the Origin System's most brilliant minds, and the unknowable Man in the Wall. The board is set and the pieces are moving. Can you put it all together in time, Tenno?

Naturally, you won’t be fighting unarmed, either. Hold fast against the dangers littered throughout Albrecht Entrati's secret laboratory with an all-new Secondary weapon class — the otherworldly Grimoire.

Whispers in the Walls will also introduce the Murmur, a brand-new faction created by the Man in the Wall, along with a reworked and expanded Necramech enemy faction. No matter how you do battle, the forces arrayed against you have never been more fearsome.

name: Truck Simulator & World of Machines: Game Bundle Collection
description: World of Machines - Tanks War operation. Features: 1. Diverse Locations 2. Challenging Missions 3. Extensive Tank Selection 4. Wide Rage of Camouflages 5. Team-Based Battles 6. Tactical Map and Reconnaissance 7.

name: Warframe: 1999
description:
Warframe: 1999 is the time-bending follow-up due for release the following year and features a distinctive, licensed track by seminal industrial rock band Nine Inch Nails: “Into the Void.” In 2024, the Tenno will return to the past in order to understand their future, and reveal the motives behind Albrecht Entrati’s perplexing research. But everything is not as it seems…

The pieces of the puzzle are falling into place, Tenno. But it will be up to you to solve it.

name: Verse Roll
description:
Roll your ball through dangerous mazes in Verse Roll!
Feel accomplished by completing challenging levels in Solo Mode or beating your opponent's recorded time in Versus Mode!
Customize your ball and win in style!

name: Save The Planets: Meteor Storm
description:
Save The Planets: Meteor Storm is a challenging fast-paced arcade game where you have to save planets from waves of asteroids that are about to destroy them.
Survive for at least 60 seconds to save Pluto, Mars, Jupiter and Earth from destruction!

name: Trapped In Here With Me
description: Trapped In Here With Me is a lightning fast arcade action game. Grind for the top score among your friends, or globally.

name: Rail Gunner
description:
Defend your train against the oncoming horde of AI controlled robots which run, fly, rocket and roll in pursuit.
Enemies are fully destructible and physically simulated (not animated) making for infinite variation in the carnage which you unleash.
Neural network control allows for a wide variety of enemies which attempt to maintain the chase even when their parts have been damaged and destroyed.
A variety of weapons and power-ups to unlock.
Game Center enabled with achievements to unlock and scores to share.

name: Bloom
description:
Bloom is a new free casual puzzle about chain reactions and a puppy with a bizarre love for berries. Follow Arya and her dog Bo in an adventure set in vibrant locations and a cute story with witty characters across hundreds of mind bending logic puzzles.
Done saving the world?
Enjoy an endless catalog of free levels created by players like you or try the ultra simple level maker to create your own level and share it with your friends! Show off your creativity and become the best creator in the world!

name: Bit Heroes Runner
description:
Bit Heroes Runner: Pixel Blitz takes pixel games on the run with an action-packed scroller that will leave you out of breath!
Escape the ferocious boss of each zone with all your loot and limbs intact and grow your 8 Bit Hero in the next installment of the Kongregate Bitverse.
Collect coins and power-ups to give your personalized 8 Bit Hero the boost they need to race over obstacles and cross the finish line to safety.
Turn your mistakes into valuable XP and watch your hero grow fast as you complete goals and unlock unique levels based on nostalgic pixel graphics.

name: Piske & Usagi's Short Trip
description:
The game is so easy! Just send Piske the Usagi on a trip and wait for them to come back. Even those who don't usually play games can enjoy this simple casual idle game without any worries.
Where will they go and what souvenirs will they bring back!?
There are over 200 locations they can visit, including special seasons and locations.
There are also over 200 souvenirs including local delicacies. Make sure to get them all!
You can redecorate their house with different furniture and the souvenirs they bring back!

name: Puzzle Grid
description:
Puzzle Grid features over 1000 brainteasing puzzles over 4 game types and 100's of unique pieces!
4 games and over 1000 levels will keep you entertained for hours. Relax with easy levels or challenge yourself with mind boggling challenging levels.
Train your brain with these fun puzzles using logic, pattern matching and a little perseverance!

name: Quadraticus HD
description:
This game features a unique gameplay included 63 different levels. In the game you will collect the image using the shape (similar to that used in tetris), which are limited to moving only one axis. Playing in Quadraticus you will be a serious mental work and you spend a lot of time trying to collect a puzzle.
To pass each stage you need to reconstruct the given puzzle image using the provided pieces. You can always see the image using hint.
Each piece can only move vertically or horizontally, and this is shown in the upper left and right squares of the board while you are touching a piece.
The board can be rotated by using the buttons in the lower left and right or with the accelerometer.

name: Am I AI
description:
Am I AI - Image Trivia Game is an exciting and addictive game that puts your visual intelligence to the test! Set to challenge players' perceptions, AM I AI is an innovative picture trivia quiz game that invites players to distinguish between AI-generated images and real images created by photographers, illustrators and designers.
Each level presents you with two similar images, one created by AI and the other real. The challenge is to identify which image has been generated by AI correctly.
With different of categories to choose from, including faces, landscapes, and more, the game offers variety and multiple levels of difficulty, for the most keen of eyes.
Immerse yourself in stunning visuals as you explore captivating images and uncover the secrets of AI-generated artwork. Train your eye to spot the subtle differences and nuances that distinguish real photos from AI-generated ones.
Engage in a captivating journey of discovery, where each correct guess brings you closer to unlocking new categories and conquering higher levels. Sharpen your visual acuity and become a master at deciphering AI-generated content.

name: BattleLand: Warrior vs. Monster
description: Challenge global players in Arena. Keep a close watch on your avengers. Start game with 10 classes, 20 roles, 40 skills and 500+ equipments.

name: Springshot
description:
Simple but very carefully crafted and you will find yourself having a blast in no time. I like to play a quick round while waiting in line for a burrito, or waiting for the airline attendant to stop blowing into that tube thingy.
Polished sounds, graphics, and details. Check out the speed control: Normal, Fast, or Hyper mode!

name: Ponon! Deluxe
description: If you think you’ve played Tetris before, think again! Ponon brings new challenges (and advantages) to one of the world’s most famous games. Fit the glowing pieces to make full horizontal lines in order to disappear. Use the ghost guide on the bottom to fit certain pieces, and swipe it down to lock it in. Act quickly, because if you don’t do your job fast enough, extra curveballs will be thrown your way as you try to avoid letting your lines reach the top!

name: Dalton: The Awesome!
description: Do you love run n' jump games or do you hate them? Whatever the case, Dalton - The Awesome is made for you! Be sure that you think twice before clicking buy this game cuz it's insanely addictive!!!

name: Smash Hue
description: Smash Hue is a simple but challenging puzzle platform game.

name: Safari Kart
description: Race from volcanic jungles to freezing cold ice lakes, unlocking new tracks and characters. Can you be the one to champion all of the Cups?

name: A-2481
description:
A-2481 - the horror game is one of the few games that really make you scared.
Have you ever thought about possibility to control human brain at a distance? Can we do that? The same ideas occupied our hero’s mind. A journalist of a small provincial newspaper finds fragments of information about a secret military bunker of the USSR times codenamed «А-2184» where such experiments were obviously carried out in strict secrecy. Without a moment's hesitation you decide to start searching for answers for your new article!
Dark and gloomy corridors of the bunker are a real thrill. And forsaken rooms where it seems people worked not so long ago, are terrifying. Every minute of stay in this evil place will make you go away as soon as possible. What is waiting for you there? Let’s find out!

name: Jurassic Pet: Virtual World
description: First visit at the park? No Problem, your advisor Greeno the Dino will help you with your first steps to become the best Jurassic tycoon!

name: No Brakes io
description:
Race real players in this relaxed and colorful multiplayer game. Upgrade your shape, face and color to find your perfect ride.
An indie game created by Niclas Aberg, the original developer of No Brakes.

name: HyperBowl Tokyo
description:
Bowl the streets of Tokyo! In the sixth and final of the original HyperBowl lanes, dodge traffic and roll through the bright lights of Ginza!
Swipe up along the screen to push the bowling ball forward, left and right to roll horizontally, down to push the ball back. Pinch to pause.

name: Magic Paths HD
description:
Be ready to kill the boredom with a very innovative and challenging logic game now on the iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.
The cupid has to keep the smiley always happy by collecting the hearts. All you need to do is to move it by drawing various shapes to reach the hearts.
Sounds easy right, but trust us; it’s not as easy as it sounds. The game starts out casually, but as you play it, you'll discover it to be extremely perplexing and at the same time you’ll want it even more!
The better you get, the harder the levels become and you never know, you may luckily find out a very convenient and easy way through some of the most brain rattling levels.

name: AuroraBound
description: AuroraBound is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game, where you link matching pieces together to discover beautiful hidden patterns.

name: Back & Forth 2
description: Back & Forth 2 is fresher, leaner & meaner. And the best part, now you can play for free until your obsession takes over.

name: Knight Without Sword
description: A strategy and tactics game, you will play the role of an apprentice knight, use your wisdom to kill enemies without using any attack means, get gold coins, and reach the end point, in addition, don't forget to bring your chicken, it is your important partner !

description: A collection of minigames during a festival set after the events of Megami Ibunroku Persona. The minigames include races, quizzes, fortune-telling, an art gallery, puzzles, karaoke, air hockey, a shuffle game, and a shooting gallery. With other features like a sound player, persona compendium, music videos with remixed songs, and dress-up.

description: 14 levels of hard-hitting Doom II action, with new graphics, sound and music, and some damned impressive scenery!

description: You've been knocked out by someone and lost your memory, and in front of you is a girl tied to a pole. Work with the girl to free yourself from the reincarnation in the basement. Will you be able to uncover the girl's dark secrets and blossom a true relationship with her?

description: KSudoku is a free version of the popular logic game Sudoku developed by the KDE community. The game is to fill a nine by nine grid with the numbers from one to nine filling the rows, columns and three by three squares without repeating a value on them.

name: Yakuzukuri Puzzle Yumeiro Yuramu
description:
Yakuzukuri Puzzle Yumeiru Yuramu, also known simply as Yumeiro Yuramu, is a falling-blocks puzzle game by Nippon Ichi Software.

The basic gameplay consists of the player dropping dominos of two colored blocks onto the playfield. When four blocks of the same color are connected, they form a tetromino. As the player forms patterns such as multiple same-colored tetrominoes connecting or tetrominos forming a square, a score counter next to the playfield will increase. When the player has a valid points-earning board, they may either finish the round to cash in their points, or continue to build, at the expense of possibly losing points if they fail to raise the value of their board.

The game can be either played solo or in versus mode against an opponent, either a CPU-controlled or human opponent. Versus-human play can be done either locally or online, with cross-platform play available between Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 players. When playing versus, each round the player whose board is worth more points will damage the opponent's HP with an amount equal to the value of their board. The first player to deplete their opponent's HP wins.

name: Anime Paradise
