name: 3D Movie Maker
description: Microsoft's 3D Movie Maker allows you to create your own 3D movies. Place your actors and props in the scene, choose actions for them to perform, and add sound effects, speech, music, and text. You can also explore the studio and theater building to find the lost pages of the Talent Book and learn the actors' stories.

name: 20 in 1
description: Official compilation licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Simulator
description:
You're not the nightguard, in FNaF: Simulator you play as the animatronics!
Get to experience FNaF from a variety of animatronic POV's within a multitude of locations in the beloved FNaF franchise.

name: Five Nights With 39
description:
You have been called out, by a teal animatronic bunny with glasses, his name is 39.
He has a strange personality, something you wouldn't see in your average animatronic, he's foul, he's roudy, he's stupid, and he's coming for you! Survive his random movements, and his little pal that will surely end you if you are not quick enough, boop his nose to keep him away!

name: Evil Journey: Plan A
description: It's a five map episode, that takes place on Earth. It mixes realistic and abstract mapping, and features new sounds, textures, enemies and stuff.

name: Church
description: Sequel of We're All Dead Here

name: A Collection of Mini-Games
description: This is just a handful of mini-games that I created as I learn how to use and just play around with my RPGMaker. I created these just for fun, but was happy enough with the results that I wanted to let them be played by people to get their opinions, or any advice they may have.

name: Six Souls: Requiem for Forgotten Birds
description: Six Souls: Requiem for the Forgotten Birds is a free visual novel with rpg elements inspired by 16-bit jRPGs. At the moment it is NOT a full version, latest patch: P1.03.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite: Classic Puzzle Pack
description: Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content. Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Enjoy Classic mode or try out Zen mode for a new type of puzzle experience.

name: Lost Dream: Overgrown
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Lost Dream: Overgrown, a serene walking simulator that will take you on a tranquil and introspective journey through a mystical overgrown realm.

name: HoneyCome Come Come Party
description: Discover the ultimate in character customization. Mold your perfect partner to your exacting specifications, then fall in love—or descend into the deepest depths of carnal desire...

name: Finity
description:
Welcome to Finity: a thoughtful, handcrafted matching game.

A few rules lead to endless strategy, flow, and exciting close calls.

1. Tiles wrap around.

2. Slide rows or columns to match 3.

3. Moves are limited, so think carefully!

Climb the leaderboards as you level up your skills to unlock challenging special tiles, power ups, and new themes to suit your mood in Classic Mode.

Or swipe over to Tempo Mode and get lost in music while you make swift matches and find your flow.

Finity will continue to expand and evolve over time, so look out for updates soon.

name: FIFA Manager 2023
description: A mod of the EA FIFA Manager 2013 bringing players and clubs from 2023 to the orginal game that is no longer continued by EA Sports.

name: Drift Mine Satellite
description:
A maintenance text adventure about a person living underground in a limestone mine and their work maintaining the local communication network that has sprung up there.

Stemming from a (real!) visit to a decommissioned limestone mine that is now used to house RVs and boats over the winter (and a subsequent phone notification, under several hundred feet of rock, that the space station was visible overhead), Drift Mine Satellite imagines what a post-apocalyptic community life might look like among sleeping vacation vehicles. It is a utopian apocalypse fantasy, a forever-camping world narrowed to linear miles of RVs parked under a mountain, the people who live in them, and the systems that interconnect them, both social and material.

The game was commissioned for Solar Protocol, a network of solar powered servers that connects from whatever server is in the most sunshine. It is programmed for the browser, with low-energy use and computational power front of mind. The entire story is told via spatialized text - no images, no libraries, just divs and textboxes and basic javascript.

name: Bestri
description: A collection of 3 games: 'Die Break', 'Heuk Sua Baek Sa' and 'Penta'.

name: Beyond Kung-Fu
description: Unreleased prototype was canned because it tested badly. Also known as Super Spartan X.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Shooter's Challenge
description: Released in February 2002.

name: Big Buck Hunter
description: Released in December 2000.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Call of the Wild
description: Released in March 2005.

name: Big Buck Hunter II: Sportsman's Paradise
description: Released in August 2002.

name: Superfetch Dog
description:
Play fetch as Gale the goodest boy.

Superfetch Dog a platformer where you need to fetch the orb for your owner. Run across various landscapes, jump over obstacles, climb trees, bark at small creatures, avoid dangerous wildlife, learn new tricks… Do anything you can to retrieve the orb before it’s too late!

Nothing can stop a good boy like Gale.

name: The Tartine's Show
description: In a world made of toast, you are the best, the only one. You are part of

name: Art&.. More
description: Art&.. More is a 1-bit ART gallery for Playdate Catalog with Collecting and Arcade gameplay!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+: Mehagashi-hen
description: An extra arc bundled in Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+.

name: Pong Legends
description: A free-to-play, real-time beer pong battler. Play instantly, anywhere. No app download required.

name: Love Island: The Game - Chelsea's Murder Mystery
description: Chelsea's Murder Mystery is a spin-off series that takes place after the events of Season 2 of Love Island: The Game.

name: Love Island: The Game - The Boat Party
description: The Boat Party is a spin-off series that takes place after the events of Season 3 of Love Island: The Game.

name: Street Fighter VI 12 Peoples
description: An unlicensed port of snes version of Street Fighter on nes. Developed by Cony Soft, this version removes Dhalsim and Zangief from the roster, possibly so the game uses less space. The title screen appears different compared to the previous versions and the game has a later copyright date, but other than that, it remains the same as the 16 Peoples version.

name: Baldi's Farm!
description: Your friend wants to eat some corn, so he kicks you out to buy corn, but you don't have enough money on you, when Baldi finds you and he wants to invite you to his farm! It would be better if there was corn, and I believe you will definitely have fun on the farm!

name: Trev to the Rescue!
description:
Trev to the Rescue is an interactive movie adventure that has been designed for the whole family. With over an hour of high quality video and a lively and original soundtrack, young children up to adults will enjoy what it has to offer.

Filmed on location in Australia, Trev to the Rescue is full of fun and adventures. Explore the house and street where you live, have a game of one-on-one basketball, search for clues by the river, visit Mount Brown, known for it's mountain biking tracks and crazy hermit, hike through the nearby national park and rainforest. And wherever you go, you can talk to and interact with the characters you meet.

name: Who Wants to Be a Hypnoslut?
description:
Want our girlboss star presenter, Priestess Synergy-12, to break into your mind in front of a live studio audience? We have great news: in Who Wants to Be a Hypnoslut, you can experience exactly that!

Answer goofy video game trivia questions, get turned into an obedient drone, and become a piece of human furniture in this new interactive erotic hypnosis experience from Nyx Goddess Games!

name: Bars of Black and White
description:
You can't remember the last time you left your room. When you receive a barcode reader in the mail, you discover that the world around you is not what it seems, and must escape the bars of black and white.

"Bars of Black and White" is a game in the room-escape tradition with hand-drawn line art graphics and novel barcode-scanning action. Is the world insane, or is it you?

name: Sailor Fuku Senshi Felis
description: A UFO came and abducted three girls. Their classmate rode her grandfather fighter spaceship and hurried to rescue!

name: Kaibutsu Para-Dice
description: A Role-Playing game, developed and published by Make, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Gensei Fukyo Den
description:
Gensei Fūkyō Den is a Japanese RPG with a somewhat "light" approach, both in story-telling and gameplay. The gameplay mostly follows the standard procedure of Japanese-style RPGs, although some features are simplified: there is no "world map", and town navigation is menu-based. Most of the gameplay consists of navigating maze-like top-down dungeons, fighting random enemies in turn-based first-person perspective combat. Characters use special points (SP) for powerful attacks and magic points (MP) for spells.

Released through Disc Station Vol. 4 in 1994 for PC-9801.

name: Gensei Kitan: Disc Saga III
description: The player navigates Smash and his friends through top-down locations, talking to people and fighting randomly appearing enemies in hostile areas. The turn-based battles are viewed from a side perspective. Characters can execute various "techniques", which deplete TP (technique points), or magic spells.

name: PSS-61
description: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: PSS-62
description: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Gensei Kaito Den
description:
Gensei Kaitō Den is set in the same world as Gensei Kitan. Important characters from Gensei Kitan (including its protagonist, the dog Smash) appear in the game, and some of them are playable. However, the main hero is a young and very ambitious thief named Ali-Baba - who is, naturally, the leader of a band of 40 robbers. The game is divided into chapters; each one describes an episode from Ali-Baba's "career", from train robbery to treasure hunt and even discovery of the magic lamp .

The game is a humorous "light" Japanese-style RPG - there is no world map, and most of the time the hero is taken to a new location automatically. Many locations have simple puzzles to solve, and some dungeon areas are maze-like. The gameplay system is nearly identical to that of Gensei Kitan, with the same interface and overall structure. Random enemies are fought in turn-based style, on a side-view battle screen. Characters use physical attacks, special techniques, and magical spells. As in all Gensei games, HP, SP, and MP are fully restored by level up.

name: PSS-63
description: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: PSS-64
description: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Gensei Torimonocho
description: A turn-based role playing game in the Gensei Kitan series.

name: Gensei Kaishingeki
description: A game in the Gensei Kitan series released in Disc Station Vol. 12.

name: Gensei Haiyuuki
description: Released through Disc Station Vol. 20 in 1998 for Windows 95.

name: Gensei Kitan Gaiden 1
description: Released through Disc Station Vol. 17.

name: Gensei Kitan Gaiden 2
description: Released through Disc Station Vol. 18.

name: Gensei Suikoden Plus
description: A remake of Gensei Suikoden for NIntendo Switch.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Onikakushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Watanagashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Pucca Wars
description: Gather a squad of 5 funny heroes and participate in the battles against various opponents. Apply incredible skills of your heroes and win! In this merry Android game you will experience incredible adventures, hunt treasures and fight against hordes of enemies. Complete interesting missions and enlarge your collection of characters. Gain experience and develop heroes increasing their characteristics. Join a guild and play with your friends. Fight against other players worldwide, win, get rich prizes and increase your rating.

name: Pucca, Let’s Cook!
description: A Pucca mobile game.

name: Emil Chronicle Online
description: Emil Chronicle Online was a 3D Japanese fantasy MMORPG with anime-style graphics. Set in the land of Acronia, the game featured twelve classes spread among four races, each with a particular advantage (agility, magic, or strength). Along with a series of quests and battles, the game featured a few standout modes including its marionette system, where players could transform their characters into marionettes, which were Pokémon-like surrogates. Marionettes could live in the world even when players had logged out. There was also a standard pet system outside of this. Players could also turn their characters into weapons that other people could use, gaining both experience. PvP was in RvR format, and massive battles were scheduled regularly in advance for different level groups.

name: Magical Squadron
description: Magical Squadron is a hybrid of adventure and stategy/RPG. In the adventure mode, the player characters travel around the world going on lighthearted adventures. The player begins with three characters, and can build their party with additional characters they meet over the game. In the strategy/RPG mode, the player engages in combat on a grid very similar to games such as Sega's Shining Force.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Kimi ni Steady
description: A dating sim for PC.

name: Kimi ni Steady
description: Kimi ni Steady is a dating simulation game that was first released in PC Windows in the year 1998. In the game the player takes the role of young high school student that wants to find love before Christmas, the game begins in September and he got 4 months to find the perfect girl for him.

name: Monster Collection: Kamen no Madoushi
description: A Role-Playing game, developed by Kadokawa and published by ESP Software, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Himatsubushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Dance Trips
description: Collaboration between Otomate and voice actor Kenjiro Tsuda. Otomate's first mobile game centering on a dance group.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Meakashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the first arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Horrors of Helmsfirth
description: Horrors of Helmsfirth is a horror/adventure visual novel where you investigate the mystery causing townsfolk to disappear at night. Build trust with allies who can help save your town from monsters. Explore 9 different character plot lines and defeat the forces of evil… or join them?

name: Taxi Simulator in City
description: Explore the city, pick up passengers in the thrilling Taxi Simulation-Arcade game! Join Taxi Simulatır In City with diverse vehicle options, 50+ missions, fun stunt tracks, and free roam.

name: Skibidi Toilet Hero
description: You are the last Cameraman who will have to fight off the army of Skybidy Toilets with the help of various weapons and cheerful music.

name: Step By Step
description: In a game where you can't stop moving, every step is progress. But whether that progress is forward or backward, that is up to you...

name: Go Go Zombies
description:
Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!
First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!
Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack nearby enemies automatically.

name: Dataminers
description: Dataminers is a fast turn-based roguelike where you climb and clear highly secured towers full of data. Outsmart guards and hack terminals in this unique combination of strategy, stealth and Minesweeper.

name: Void Crawler
description: Void Crawler is a horror game set in a dystopian future, where you pilot a vehicle nicknamed 'The Mole' into a mysterious void deep within the Earth to collect an extremely valuable material for a company dedicated to solving the world's energy crisis.

name: Rebel
description: To find his past, to choose his future.

name: Only Down
description: Only Down is a platform jumping parkour game. It is produced by the independent studio OldCat Digital Studio, with a single person named OldCat. Only Down, as the name suggests, means players move from the sky to the ground or below, ultimately obtaining the treasure.

name: Logistic Master
description: Logistic Master is a real-time economic strategy in which you have to lead a logistics company. Connect cities, build warehouses, buy transport, transport various goods. Relax and have fun!

name: Shipwrecked
description: Shipwrecked on a uncharted island, master survival alone or with friends. Battle, build, and conquer foes as you confront the mysteries lurking in its shadows.

name: Historia Realis: Rome
description: Be a Roman in this drama-filled grand strategy game with a focus on historical realism. Run for political office, fight in the legions, get married and educate your heir. Deal with rivals through violence, favors or intrigue while thousands of other characters live their own triumphs and tragedies.

name: Young Team Sounds
description: Break the dead ends! A music creation adventure where the sounds you create change depending on your "emotional choices". A dark tale of creation, modelled on the real world and real events.

name: William's Dad's Secret
description: You can't sleep at night. There's something trying to get into your room and you don't know what it is. You must do whatever is possible to stop it.

name: Workplace Fantasy
description: The main stage of "Workplace Fantasy" is a fictional seaside town, which tells the story of a newly graduated intern working and living here, as well as communicating, interacting, and delving deeper into various residents of the town.

name: Xanthiom 2
description: Play through the next chapter in the Xanthiom saga, now bigger and better than before!

name: Year Unknown
description: A story-based exploration game about the very far future, where humanity has conquered the universe. With the help of two Artificial Intelligences, explore the conquered universe and uncover your purpose in it.

name: VectorBall
description: A time-traveling, dimension-shifting, mind-bending roguelike game. Guided by the enigmatic AI, Vector, you'll delve into the fabric of existence, traversing ancient ruins and future realms. Every playthrough brings new challenges, insights, and hidden truths. Dare to redefine your reality?

name: Velarune
description: Explore a seamless and colorful world while being hunted by a cosmic wolf in this beautiful third-person adventure game. Uncover the scarred past of Velarune by solving puzzles and collecting relics. Discover the secrets of this secluded land before time runs out…

name: Oasis: Tokyo
description: Oasis: Tokyo is an FPS with a focus on inventory management that has roguelite elements. Complete procedurally generated missions in a shady underworld.

name: Wheelchair Tester
description: Test a wheelchair equipped with a jet engine to see if it can handle various real-life scenarios. Rest assured, you won't need to sit in the wheelchair – we have professional crash test dummies for that.

name: Wildkins
description: Dive into strategic battles, explore fantasy lands, and collect unique creatures. Rise as the top Wildkin trainer!

name: Velocity Valley
description: Race up to 8 players for the fastest lap in 7 minutes. Manage tire wear (soft, medium, hard). Completing 8 laps earns players a coin bonus to unlock new tracks. Violations such as going on the grass, crashing, or multiple cars in the pitlane incur a 3-second penalty.

name: Undercroft Warriors
description: Crush the forces of hell and get a high score in this addictive, action-packed, arcade-inspired twin-stick shooter!

name: Mystery of Dust
description: A sudden mechanical rebellion. An ordinary girl who has gained power. Faced with a "world-class" crisis. Is there a secret behind the rebellion? Is the power gained safe? Can a few people's journey save the world? Find out in the tower defense RPG, Mystery of the Dust!

name: Age of Tribulation
description: Age of Tribulation is a dark fantasy, dragon warrior inspired, roguelite. Explore an open world full of dangers in turn-based combat. With permadeath and a day/night cycle, study the codex and learn your enemies or meet certain death.

name: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves)
description: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves) is a game where you flirt your way behind wolf-enemy lines. Your mission? To infiltrate wolf speed dating, pee on some fire hydrants and rescue the human they've got trapped in the kitchen.

name: Turbo Chicken Simulator
description: Turbo Chicken Simulator is an immersive, open-world action RPG. It is the latest and greatest in high-tech Chicken Simulation technology.

name: True Boxing VR
description: True Boxing VR brings real life boxing experience into Virtual Reality. With super realistic game play animations, and movements the game is designed to be as close to a real life experience as possible. You will learn the basics and tactics of boxing, and use these skills to beat the opponents.

name: The Backrooms Deluxe
description: In "The Backrooms Deluxe", there are many entities blocking your way of finally exiting the backrooms. Each of the entities has its own appearance and mechanics

name: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath
description: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath is a rogue-like action game with a highly flexible combat system. ACT and Rogue-like lovers will embark on a thrilling adventure in a magical world called Sylvalond.

name: The Arena Pit
description: Ready for a blend of RPG and Tower Defense in a 2D rogue-lite game? Enter The Arena Pit! Choose your hero, wield powerful weapons and skills. Strategize your moves in the arena, setting traps, obstacles, and towers against hordes of monsters in the epic battle of good versus evil!

name: Tongue Tale
description: Join our little frog on a journey to save its world! Navigate through challenging levels in this hand-crafted platformer. With each leap and obstacle, you're one step closer to restoring balance. Dive in and help our amphibian hero make a difference!

name: The Purge
description: The Purge offers you a different experience. Embark on a dark adventure to find your lost Wife Cristina in this story-based game and unravel the mystery behind the deep story. Run from place to place with many universes, enemies and mechanical styles in it and feel the purge.

name: The Mending
description: Another threshold has been opened, and is in need of mending. It’s time to perform your duties. Weaken the demon, seal the door and send it back to Hell.

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 2
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. This game is designed on an escape game structure, you must solve a puzzle to move on to the next table. Immerse yourself into a dreamlike, strange universe, mixing exploration, mystery and poetry.

name: Tenioha! feat. Mami
description: In this 2022 Moe Game Award–winning dark romance VN, step into the shoes of a submissive young corporate cog whose dream of a big-city bachelor’s lifestyle remains elusive—that is, until he catches the captivating gaze of one Mami Himekawa, his dommy-mommy, slightly older coworker...

name: Tales From The Arcade: Starship Murder
description: The astro hauler the SS Persephone is falling apart. You - the on-board AI - are being reactivated to perform the necessary repairs. The crew claims that the captain died in a mysterious accident, the same one that conveniently erased your memory banks... Are they telling the truth?

name: Space Digger
description: Can You Survive While Mining In Space?Space Digger is a challenging and action-packed space mining, action roguelike game!

name: Shut Up, Rabbit!
description: Shut Up, Rabbit! is a shooting survival game mainly for relaxing. A chatty rabbit with sci-fi laser gun and cannon to fight with animals to survive in the forest.

name: Spider Bounce
description: Based on a simple idea, this game takes you on a journey of colorful fly hunting. You move your spider left to right and press down to dash, it is that simple. Spider Bounce builds on this idea through a variety of mechanics including upgrades and different game modes.

name: Stellar Echoes: Brave Trial
description: Stellar Echoes: Brave Trial is a mild rogue combat shooter that also allows you to turn on Endless Mode after completing the game.

name: Stellar Echoes: Boxing Champion
description: Stellar Echoes: Boxing Champion is a very special experience, especially for those who like sports.

name: Stellar Echoes: Maze Shooter
description: Stellar Echoes: Maze Shooter is a smart challenge, a maze adventure VR game that can be freely combined through maze gameplay.

name: Stellar Echoes: Ultimate Challenge
description: Stellar Echoes: Ultimate Challenge is the ultimate test.Bring all your weapons, fight like crazy, and become a qualified space warrior.

name: Strange Hill
description: Adventure in an open world with many mysteries and puzzles.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Baby Animals 2
description: Puzzles of baby animals!

name: Sugar Mess: Let's Play Jolly Battle
description: Sugar Mess: Let's Play Jolly Battle is a fun arcade first-person shooter for the whole family. Shoot from a variety of weapons at hilarious opponents! Pass colorful levels with different mechanics and immerse yourself in a fascinating story!

name: Summer After Ten Years: Steam Edition
description: Akira and Misaki always played together in their childhood. One day, Misaki had to transfer to a school overseas for her parents' reasons. They meet again in the summer of 10 years later.

name: Summon
description: I wonder who's knocking there?

name: Supercharged
description: Prepare for "Supercharged." Do Parkour, forge platforms, and climb new heights with your unique gun. Outsmart enemies, solve challenges, and shatter the boundaries of reality. Embark on a single-player odyssey, for an electrifying escape. Are you ready to wield your power?

name: Symmodance
description: Dive into the symphonic chaos of geometric warfare! Unleash futuristic weaponry, customize your hovering platform, conquer relentless foes and dance to victory in this mesmerizing reverse bullet hell shooter.

name: Rhino Puzzle
description: Solve different puzzles to go forward and collect all skulls in this 3d puzzle game.

name: Ronnarium
description: An aquarium where a huge tank called "Ronnarium" is on display. There is a rumor that if one enters the aquarium at night, he or she will be "divinely bewitched". A girl named "Yocto" hears the rumor and visits the aquarium to confirm the truth.

name: RPG Golf with Vampires
description: You are a vampire hunter. But also a golf ball. Put your way through increasingly difficult levels and hunt those pesky monsters with the help of in-game upgrades.

name: Sex Play: BDSM
description: A quick and dirty game made especially for your pleasure. It contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Here you play the role of a male dominatrix.

name: Sex Simulator: CamGirl Audition 2
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, where you play the role of an attractive woman looking for models for her studio.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 4
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki going to the Spa to relax, only to end up fucked senseless in the steamy sauna by a hunk of a man who doesn’t even bother telling her his name.

name: Sculpt
description: A cozy 3D puzzle game with cubes.

name: SCP: Equestrian
description: An indie fast-paced first person shooter set in the SCP universe with an arsenal of weapons to combo with.

name: School: The Hardest RPG in Your Life
description: School: The Hardest RPG in Your Life is a small RPG game that is happening at a high school. You play as Eli who has learned that he needs to pass all of his classes otherwise he will have to go to Summer School for his entire summer break.

name: Speedollama
description: Speedollama is a platformer shooter aiming to be one of the fastest games in the genre! Do not play it if you are an alpaca! DISCLAIMER FOR THE MORE SENSITIVE: it contains a lot of pixelated splatter elements, like alpacas exploding in a cloud of blood.

name: Russian Fight Simulator
description: Russian Fight Simulator is a 2-D combat simulator with many different weapons, maps and views to choose from!

name: New World
description: “New World” is a new survival game. Explore the world. Create your own weapons and tools. Build your own house and protect yourself from the dangers that could happen.

name: Nether Spirits: Beyond the Gate
description: Mend your shattered soul in Nether Spirits, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in a dark, fantastical afterlife corrupted by sin. Choose from seven distinct classes, explore a vast world, and fight your way to salvation - alone, with friends, or in real-time PvP!

name: Mr Mosco Bizarre Climbing
description: Help Mr. Mosco in conquering a mountain of surreal and colorful environments, aided by his sidekick ChikiChaka solving intricate platform sections. Navigate vibrant and bizarre levels in this climbing adventure!

name: Messy Up
description: "Messy UP" is a cute multiplayer game where pets destroy homes to grab the owner's attention. Due to the owner's busy schedule, they lack time for their pets. Players control the pets or play as the owner to catch them in this delightful mischief-filled game!

name: Nights To Remember
description: Nights To Remember is a Single-/Multiplayer Horror game where you have to kill mysterious Creatures in a evacuated Area. you can find Weapons and other helpful Stuff all over the Map to be ready for the Ultimate fight

name: On a Summer Night
description: "Today, I would like to tell you about one night. One night that changed my life." On a Summer Night is a short point-and-click visual novel.

name: Our Tribe Above All
description: Immerse in an inventive online co-op horde survival, fusing 'Vampire Survivor' combat with multiplayer strategy. Build your village through earned combat experience, strategize, and decide together, accompanied by captivating hand-drawn animations.

name: Puzzle Game
description: Jump into the puzzle-solving action of The "Puzzle Game" and discover what Grandpa left for you.

name: Pro Strategy Football 2024
description: PSF 2024 - even more customizations! Sports Ticker! Waiver Draft! More stats! Improved AI! Improved Editor! Career can have 1 to 16 conferences and up to 140 teams! Fatigue and Injury sliders! More rules and overtime options!

name: PlanetSmith
description: PlanetSmith is a sandbox game set on spherical worlds, offering unique exploration and creative building. Journey into procedurally generated voxel worlds that defy the conventional limits of block building. Showcase your creativity on a spherical canvas ready for your artistic touch.

name: Pixel Washer
description: Pixel Washer is a cozy, zen-like game where you play as a cute piggy power washing beautiful pixelated worlds. Wash sprites, upgrade your power washer, and find hidden secrets.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Petrol Station Sim
description: Petrol Station Sim is a fun and addictive game that puts you in the shoes of a gas station attendant.

name: Luctus
description: "Luctus," brought to life through pixel art, delves into Nora's intricate and dramatic story. As you experience this mysterious tale, you will find yourself exploring an original world, getting to know diverse characters, and engaging in epic action moments by conjuring various flame spells!

name: Matchmaker Agency
description: Hot singles near your area and they're ready to date! Not with you, no. Your job is to find them the perfect date and become the best matchmaker in town.

name: Matchmaker: Dungeon Heart
description: Matchmaker: Dungeon Heart is a narrative-driven dating & romance sim featuring match-3 gameplay. As powerful forces draw near, a Lich raises you from the dead, and tasks you with protecting the dungeons of Torkadall. As you train with the monstrous inhabitants, you may find yourself falling in love.

name: Mech vs. Bugs
description: In Mech vs Bugs, you'll pilot a mech to fend off alien insects on remote planets. Combining intense top-down combat with strategic looting and crafting, your goal is to liberate the galaxy, one insect-infested planet at a time. Ready for your thrilling, third-person adventure?

name: Meet Her There
description: An intense, intimate narrative game in 2 colors. Explore a tiny, giant world of two people, stuck in a cursed time loop. Relive a single day as many times as needed. Ask for help. Don't get arrested. Find the correct steps to try and save the person you love. Is it not too late?

name: Humanoid
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey in this survival open-world game, where a relentless creature, Humanoids prowls the landscape. Explore, craft, build, and fight for your life as you navigate the dangerous world.

name: Joe Biden: Escape From MAGA
description: Joe Biden is the 46th President Of America. Every Week he has to put up with insanely funny situations as he tries to get through his term as POTUS. After you start playing this game, prepare to enjoy laughs and hi-jinx as Joe deals with Putin, Trump, Hunter, space aliens, and everyone in the world.

name: Hidden Cats In Amusement Park
description: This is a casual and relaxing hidden object game. Find cute cats in the amusement park.Can you find them? That's right，there are a few on the carousel.

name: Hentai Devil
description: Hentai Devil is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Gym Simulator 24
description: Gym Simulator 24: Build Your Fitness Empire!Embark on a journey to create your dream fitness haven in Gym Simulator 24, the ultimate simulation game where you'll ascend the ranks and craft your very own fitness empire.

name: Grow Your Guarden
description: Grow a garden of powerful plants to defend The Great Tree from hordes of demonic creatures!

name: Girlfriend = Yog-Sothoth: Cthulhu
description: Teen Romance x Comedy x Lovecraftian. This visual novel is a must-play for fans of all three genres. It features a heartwarming romance, hilarious comedy, and edge-of-your-seat thrill. With its engaging story and memorable characters, this visual novel is sure to leave you wanting more.

name: Gold and Glory
description: Gold and Glory is a classic exploration game developed specifically for VR. Discover the treasures of a derelict pirate ship! Fight off the peculiar creatures that dwell in this strange and magical place! Seize your gold and glory!

name: Gloves On!
description: Pick up your gloves, wrap your hands, and put on your mouthpiece and headgear because Gloves On! is an action-packed boxing game with realistic and tactical controls. Get in the ring and fight an immersive and intense boxing match like you have never seen before.

name: Glitch Moba
description: Welcome to Glitch! Suit up for explosive 5v5 MOBA battles in a vibrant sci-fi universe, customize your avatar with unique abilities, and dive into fast-paced, strategic skirmishes. Your mission, is to outwit opponents, demolish enemy firewalls, and capture their database. Gear up, it's game time!

name: Legends of Mythology
description: Set forth on a journey of discovery where secrets await. Engage in methodical combat, recover items to enhance your abilities. Challenge the insurmountable and become the unexpected hero, or shun the role of the savior and embrace the mantle of the villain. Explore, adapt, triumph.

name: Last Warrior Arena
description: Last Warrior Arena is a roguelike strategy combat game, where you choose your class and develop your warrior by choosing stats, skills and buying and upgrading equipment. Your goal is to go as far as you can in the arena, fighting bosses in your way. Loosing to a boss will result in perma-death.

name: Kon's Lesson!
description: She was sealed for a thousand years… but now she’s living with you! Fulfill your contract with her by completing her lessons and feeding her “energy” in this cute ‘n steamy romantic comedy game!

name: Knock Out Walls
description: Reign supreme in a world of walls and spells. Discover powerful strategies and outsmart your rivals with cunning tactics to rise through the ranks and become the one true Wallstar!

name: Kappa Kanji Adventure
description: "Kappa Kanji Adventure" is an innovative and educational platformer game that combines the excitement of fast-paced jumping challenges with the intricate art of learning Kanji characters. Player embark on a thrilling adventure where their linguistic and platforming skills are put to the test.

name: Kalimour
description: Kalimour is a deep hex-based city-building strategy game where you explore hostile lands and create a vast and prosperous domain. Expand your borders, fend off hostiles and grow your land into the most prosperous kingdom in the world.

name: Dark Year
description: Dark Year medieval fantasy game with a dark air, embark on this adventure as Marius, a commander of the army of the northern kingdom, who must return to the castle his journey will be full of enemies and an evil that never sleeps awaits him... You will be able to face them.

name: Daikon Creatures
description: Fight against endless hordes of creatures in this survival roguelite in vast unexplored lands where you will find treasures, secrets and many challenges, but with great rewards.

name: Cursed Deal
description: Cursed Deal is a Co-Op horror game like nothing you've ever experienced before. The game focuses on a dark vampire cult and features a villain who becomes cursed by betraying his cult on the night of the ritual and turns into a dark creature. The player who made a deal with the devil to get rid of the curse, must hunt down cult members and curse them into his side. Meanwhile, the cultists must complete the ritual and gain vampire powers on this challenging night. But beware! When humans turn into vampires, the roles will change and the creature hunt will begin. You never know who will win in this game where teams and roles will change, where the hunter can be the prey and the prey can be the hunter. Hide in the dark, use your special powers, and survive. Most importantly, don't trust anyone. If your friend is cursed, he will turn into a creature and come after you.

name: CruzeCraze
description: Embark on a captivating cruise ship simulation game. Sail through the challenges of running a cruise empire. Navigate stunning waters and create unforgettable experiences. Managing crew dynamics, inventory logistics, and passenger satisfaction. Become the ultimate captain of the seas!

name: Cube Jump
description: Minimalist cube jumper with plenty of achievements.

name: Deserted "Firefly Islands": Chronicles
description: A survival game with crafting and building elements.

name: Escape Z
description: Survive the apocalypse with friends in Escape Z. Fight and plan tactics to face hordes of zombies. Choose your character, map and prepare. Survival is your only option.

name: EraTurn
description: EraTurn: Embark on an epic journey in this turn-based strategy game, shaping your civilization across the ages. Skillfully manage resources, advance technology, and expand through conquests, all while bearing witness to the world's evolution and transformation.

name: Endless Cold Journey
description: A lightweight rogue-lite game of solo survival adventure, where players will have to gather supplies, craft weapons, and enhance their chances of survival in the face of sudden extreme cold and endless waves of corpses, all in order to return to their family.

name: Eight Balls
description: This is a ball platform jumping and leisure game. You can race against time in this game or play it casually. How you want to play depends on you.

name: Echo of the Waves
description: Echo of the Waves is a poetic and atmospheric watercolor-painted exploration game where you play music to interact with nature.

name: Drakantos
description: Drakantos is a free-to-play MMORPG with a nostalgic pixel art style, combined with exciting, fast-paced action combat and more than 20 unique playable heroes.

name: Divine Shock
description: Swing, smash, and combo your way through the dead. Divine Shock is an infinitely scaling first-person rogue-lite, where you are a Paladin, standing between the dead and the mortal realm.

name: Dimension Omega
description: Explore, survive and escape the numerous levels of Dimension Omega in order to return to the real world in a creepy, liminal and eerie First-Person-Singleplayer experience while avoiding various terrifying entities that lurk in the shadows, waiting for you...

name: Astral Throne
description: Uncover the mystery of a Kingdom beset by a Falling Star's curse in this retro-inspired Roguelike SRPG. Build your party, recruit new allies, and synergize your team's skills for decisive victory.

name: A Story in Bronze Ware
description: Welcome to Bamboo Spring Town. Revitalize your garden through farming, gathering, and manufacturing, gradually enriching your resources and resisting invasions. In the real historical environment, resist the invasion of foreigners, unite the vassals and powers for the final victory.

name: Ancient Relics: Egypt
description: Embark on an Egyptian adventure with Linda and Robert, solving puzzles and restoring a once-thriving village to its former splendor.

name: All Alone
description: A missing father, a mysterious murder, paintings depicting missing children. Horror game in which the protagonist, who has lost his memory, is forced to get to a horrific truth. Who in the world are you?

name: Ascension X
description: Our Holy Emperor needs our aid to help rescue the innocent civilians on Earth from the evil Corporations that took over the World. The Templars will help achieve peace on an Apocalyptic Earth, help the development of Mars civilization and explore new planets in the Universe!

name: 3D Survivors
description: "3D Survivors" is a flashy and vibrant casual game. Take down the approaching monsters from all directions with high firepower. Obtain various power-up items to prepare for the final boss. Use the acquired score to upgrade the characters.

name: At Light Speed
description: An extremely challenging 3D platformer. After crash landing, you must find your way home through an obscenely dangerous asteroid belt. This world is filled with massive jump challenges, all to be completed on just one life.

name: Chaos
description: The life that we knew has changed, The Chaos took control of the streets. Experience a post-apocalyptic world where your survival skills are crucial.

name: Bright Day
description: You awaken to a bright and sunny day. Wanting to go out and enjoy the beauty of the sun, you find that mysteriously, you can't leave. The doors are locked. No one is home. Strange noises can be heard behind your shoulder. Can you survive the nightmare slowly forming around you?

name: Beyond Fantasy
description: Beyond Fantasy is a top-down shooter mixed with survivor-like elements. In-game mini-games give you the opportunity to acquire pets and colleague.

name: Celbugs
description: A colour-matching puzzle game in which you breed cute critters - Celbugs - and use them to beat levels.

name: Codebreaker: Defuse or Boom
description: Crack the code! A thrilling spy-themed puzzle game. Think fast, your mission awaits!

name: Possessions
description: Welcome to Possessions, a ghoulish game of programs, puzzles, and poltergeists. In Possessions, you play as a restless spirit, wandering from neighborhood to neighborhood and home to home, possessing the residents therein, and messing with their relationships however suits your fancy. Why? Gotta pass time in the afterlife somehow.
